title: KCCBSSA Girls Football Team Support
label: When our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best
details: KCCBSSA initiated/formed a Girls Football Team in Debre Birhan town in 2012. Our main objective in initiating the girlsâ€™ football team was to give a chance to the girls to be part of the sports to build their physical as well as their intellectual abilities and positively compete with their male Peers.
